subject: Pedals not working
description_text: Hi; I just received my pedals and they do not work; they registered in the app but did not work in any games; now they do not register in the app anymore. Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Earlando James, Please provide your order number, the model of your pedals, and a screenshot of the Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 software interface. You can try manually restoring the firmware. Also, be sure to use a USB 3.0 port and avoid using a hub. Unstable power supply may cause connection issues or missing accessories.
Thank you, it's working perfectly now, and it's a great product too. Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
